46461.「これが…… こんなものがっ！\n わしが 坊ちゃまを お育て申し上げたのは\n:
This... this thing! I did not raise you to
make this monster!

46462.「坊ちゃまは これからの世界を導いてゆく\n 選ばれし お方であるというのに……:
The boy is the chosen one who will lead the
world from now on...

46463.「こんなことになってしまって わしは\n 亡き旦那様に なんと 申し開きすれば\:
How can I ever repent to my late master for
what I've done!

46464.「……取り乱して スマンかった。\n 坊ちゃま……バレクス様は わしが仕えていた:
I'm sorry for the confusion. My boy...Barex-
sama is a sergeant of a prestigious family
that I used to work for.

46465.「その血統は レンダーシアに古くから続く\n いにしえの大賢者の血を伝える 貴き:
The lineage of this noble family is the blood of the great sages of Lendersia, who have lived in Lendersia from time immemorial.
Master Barex is the sole heir to this lineage.

46466.「血筋だけではない。幼き頃より 神童と称えられ\n いずれは 賢者の最高峰 叡智:
It is not only his bloodline. From an early age, it was said that he was a child prodigy and would eventually be welcomed into the
highest rank of sages, the Crown of Wisdom...

46467.「坊ちゃまの養育係として お仕えしていた\n わしは そりゃあもう 鼻が高かった:
I was so proud to serve as your foster
mother... how could I let this happen? How did
it come to this?

46468.「天才の名をほしいままに ご成長なされ\n 成年となり 家督を継がれた 坊ちゃま:
The young man, who had grown up to be a genius
and had taken over the reigns of the family,
suddenly disappeared one day.

46469.「以来１０数年……ようやく 探し当てた\n 坊ちゃまは なぜか 道具鍛冶ギルドな:
Ten years have passed since then... and I
finally found him... and somehow he's become a
member of the Toolsmith Guild. ...

46470.「坊ちゃまが 何を考えておられるのか\n わしには さっぱりじゃが……\n ひと:
I have no idea what the boy is thinking... but
I can tell you one thing for sure.

46471.「今からでも 賢者の道に戻ることこそが\n 坊ちゃまにとっても 世の民草にとって:
It would be better for you and for the people
of the world if you returned to the path of
the sage, even now!

46472.「道具鍛冶職人は 他の者にも できようが\n 大賢者として 国を救い 民を導くこ:
Others may be able to forge tools, but only
he, as the Great Sage, can save the country
and lead his people...

46473.「……さて ここまで聞いた以上\n おぬしには 坊ちゃまを 賢者の正道に戻す\n:
Now that I've heard all this, you are to help
me return the young man to the right path of
the sage.

46474.「今回 正体を偽って 道具鍛冶ギルドに\n 仕事なぞ依頼したのは ギルド内部に協:
The reason I lied about my true identity this time, and requested a job with the Toolsmith Guild, was because I wanted someone inside the
guild to help me...

46475.「具体的な作戦は これから立てるとして\n とりあえず 坊ちゃまに わしのことは:
I'll come up with a concrete plan now, but for
now, please keep my secret from the boy. I'm
counting on you!
